Text: Fwd Re testimony filings listThe Modesto Irrigation District would like to offer the following issue as an additional issue to the list that Staff has prepared Is the CAISOs data for calculating the Mitigated Market Clearing Price in such a form that allows other Market Participants to determine whether the Mitigated Market Clearing Price was properly calculated Thank you for preparing this list Sean Neal Sean Neal Duncan Weinberg Genzer Pembroke PC M Street NW Suite Washington DC tel fax joann ERCFEDUS AM Judge Birchman asked me to send you his list of testimony he has In other words if your testimony is not on there heads up In the interest of full disclosure here is our exchange of emails I sent a separate email saying that Avista is part of the Competitive Supplier Group that sponsored Dr Chicchetti

MID Data Response to ISO ELRe MID Data Responses to ISO Please find attached the data responses of the Modesto Irrigation District to the ISO Attachments will be handdelivered to Swidler Berlin Shereff Friedman tomorrow along with responses to FERC Staff to which this data response refers This document is being mailed to the restricted service list Sean Neal Sean Neal Duncan Weinberg Genzer Pembroke PC M Street NW Suite Washington DC tel fax MID Resp to ISOs First DR to c partiesDOC
